data.name: alki bakery
data.hours: Mon: 6AM - 3PM  Tue: 6AM - 3PM  Wed: 6AM - 3PM  Thu: 6AM - 3PM  Fri: 6AM - 3PM  Sat: Closed   Sun: Closed
data.blurb: Bottom line up front: A 3.75-star cafe that gets extra points for impossible prices and consistent, quick and professional service. Plus the croissants and cookies you like to get at your local cafe? It probably comes from here. Think of this as a storefront for what is basically a distribution center.
data.pastry: Best Pastry Here: The chocolate croissant!  Especially if you like it warmed up, is so good.
data.item: About the Item: The chocolate croissant is  my favorite, and I still haven’t found the perfect one, but this one is good!

data.name: nuflours
data.hours: Mon: Closed  Tue: 7AM - 7PM  Wed: 7AM - 7PM  Thu: 7AM - 7PM  Fri: 7AM - 8PM  Sat: 7AM - 8PM    Sun: 8AM - 5PM
data.blurb: The place is clean and the people are amazing! Oh, and the baked goods are out of this world! Their prices are a bit high but all ingredients are local and it’s all GLUTEN FREE!
data.pastry:
Best Pastry Here: Gluten free cinnamon roll.        
About The Item:  I don't think I'll ever find the gluten-free, doughy, squishy cinnamon roll of my dreams, but this is a great substitute!
data.item: About the Item:  I don't think I'll ever find the gluten-free, doughy, squishy cinnamon roll of my dreams, but this is a great substitute!

data.name: byen bakeri
data.hours: Mon: Closed Tue: 6AM- 5PM  Wed: 6AM - 5PM   Thu: 6AM - 5PM  Fri: 6AM - 5PM  Sat: 6:30AM - 5PM  Sun: 7AM - 4PM
data.menu: marzipan, almond, chocolate, cookie, almond croissant
data.blurb: Byen Bakeri is Scandinavian pastry heaven.  The first time I walked into this hallowed place my mouth dropped open. Its like walking into Total Wine for the first time... or maybe a kid walking into Toys R'Us for the first time. The mind is boggled at the vast array and beauty of all the delightful morsels and cakes on display. It's nearly impossible to walk out of this place without 2 to 3 boxes full.
data.pastry: Best Pastry Here: Royal Almond Croissant
data.item: About the Item: Thick rich flaky buttery crouissant with a thick layer of delish almond paste in the middle, what's not to love.

data.name: cafe besalu
data.hours: Mon: 6:30AM- 3PM Tue: 6:30AM- 3PM  Wed: 6:30AM- 3PM   Thu: 6:30AM- 3PM  Fri: 6:30AM- 3PM  Sat: 6:30AM- 3PM  Sun: 6:30AM- 3PM
data.menu: danish, biscuit, ginger, pear, pretzel, hot chocolate, hot cocoa
data.blurb: Cafe Besalu is your classic french bakery and patisserie. Their homey shop offers a variety of croissants, danishes, and quiches. Their workers are friendly but keep the line going! They offer coffee, espresso, and tea to pair with their authentic pastries that do not disappoint.
data.item: About the Item: A soft and flakey twist that will pair well with any drink choice. Soft, flakey, sweet yet spicy pastry dough that will melt in your mouth. Good for anytime of the day!

data.name: bakery nouveau
data.hours: Mon: 6AM-7PM  Tue: 6AM-7PM  Wed: 6AM-7PM  Thu: 6AM-7PM   Fri: 6AM-7PM  Sat: 7AM-7PM  Sun: 7AM-6PM
data.blurb: Bakery Nouveau has all things pastries, breads, chocolates, and everything in between. The hardest thing about coming here is deciding how much to get. They offer pastries for every mood and time of day - savory or sweet, night or day. While they do not offer much room to sit and stay a while, they are open seven days a week and will always be there when you're looking for your next pastry fix!
data.pastry: Best Pastry Here: Twice Baked Almond Croissant
data.item: About the Item: Crispy and crunchy on the inside, fluffy and flakey on the inside with a delicious almond filling! These croissants are a must-have - they even offer one with chocolate!

data.name: general porpoise
data.hours: Mon: 7AM - 3PM Tue: 7AM - 3PM  Wed: 7AM - 3PM  Thu: 7AM - 3PM Fri: 7AM - 3PM  Sat: 7AM - 3PM  Sun: 7AM - 3PM
data.menu: doughnut, donut, chocolate doughnut, marshmallow, vanilla custard, lemon curd, creme brulee cream, apricot jam
data.blurb: General Porpoise is not your typical donut shop. Reminiscent of malasadas, their donuts are fried to perfection and rolled in sugar but also feature a variety of delicious fillings. While filings like vanilla custard and chocolate marshmallow are permanent offerings, they rotate through a number of unique flavors. In addition, they offer a quality selection of tea and coffees from a number of roasters. Their donuts are pricey but worth a try (or two!)
data.pastry: Best Pastry Here: Chocolate Marshmallow Donut
data.item: About The Item: Crispy fried donut, covered in granulated sugar, filled with a fluffy and chocolatey gooey mixture - extremely satisfying and will keep you coming back for more!

data.name: crumble & flake patisserie
data.hours: Mon: Closed Tue: Closed  Wed: 7AM - 3PM  Thu: 7AM - 3PM Fri: 7AM - 3PM  Sat: 9AM - 3PM  Sun: 9AM - 3PM
data.menu: tarte, flambee, pistachio, twice-baked ham, twice baked ham, smoked paprika croissant, cream puffs, cinnamon rolls, goat cheese, scone, macaron, cheweos, passion fruit squares, financiers, chocolate chip cookie, pink peppercorn shortbread
data.blurb: The best French baked goods but no seating and you can only buy up to 6 of one item. Make sure to get there early because most of the top items will sell out just a few hours after opening.
data.item: About The Item: Simple but essential, the croissants at Crumble &  Flake are something you just wish was the standard everywhere. It is also available with almond, pistachio, chocolate, cheddar and paprika or ham & cheese.

data.name: hood famous bakeshop
data.hours: Mon: Closed Tue: Closed  Wed: Closed  Thu: 11AM - 8PM Fri: 11AM - 8PM   Sat: 11AM - 8PM   Sun: 11AM - 8PM
data.menu: ube, dark chocolate, sari sari, cheesecake, vietnamese, coffee, white chocolate, guava, matcha, coconut pandan, calamansi, mango, vanilla bean, mini cheesecake, lemon bar
data.blurb: Hood Famous Bakeshop lands in the zone of not really being a pastry bakery. They specialize in Filipino desserts including ube cheesecake. They do however have a lemon bar that is absolutely amazing!
data.item: About The Item:  This lemon bar will take you to another level. It’s an unexpected gem in a tiny basement bakery that is easy to miss.

data.name: la parisienne french bakery
data.hours: Mon: 7AM - 7PM Tue: 7AM - 7PM  Wed: 7AM - 3PM  Thu: 7AM - 7PM Fri: 7AM - 7PM  Sat: 7AM - 6PM  Sun: Closed
data.menu: tarte, paris-brest, citron, eclair,  choux chantilly, mille-feuille, religieuse, jam, chai latte, cafe mocha, drip coffee, espresso, hot tea, hot chocolate, cold milk, cappuccino
data.blurb: If you’re looking for more sweet than savory, this is the place to be! Their croissants are huge, as is their selection of
data.pastry: Best Pastry Here:  Tarte - ALL OF THEM
data.item: About The Item:  Seriously, go try any of their tarts and you will be amazed. The citron tart is my personal go to but the chocolate is great if you aren’t a fan of citrus.

data.name: fuji bakery
data.hours: Mon: 7AM - 3PM Tue: 7AM - 3PM  Wed: 7AM - 3PM  Thu: 7AM - 3PM Fri: 7AM - 3PM  Sat: 7AM - 3PM  Sun: 7AM - 3PM
data.menu: bun, mini croissant, matcha, chocolate, mango, coconut, raspberry, cinnamon roll, danish, poire, pear, ruby red danish, almond stick, orange, pomme, vanilla custard, fraise, clafoutis, azuki donut, doughnut, corn flakes, melon, lemon, panettone, raisins, orange peels, macaron
data.blurb: Have to admit that I found this location while on morning run a couple months back and figured it couldn't hurt to reward myself a little.  It's one of the less romantic and quintessentially anything shops but it's goods stand up to the rest.  With a fun and eclectic array of savory and sweet pastries, this place has something for everyone. You can find two more Fuji locations in International District and Bellevue.
data.pastry: Best Pastry Here:  Beef Curry Bun & Ruby Red Danish
data.item: About The Item: The Beef Curry Bun is to die for and the Ruby Red Danish with its multiple levels of texture and glazed bitter grapefruit nested in sweet custard is divine.

data.name: rosellini's bakery
data.hours: Mon: Closed Tue: Closed  Wed: 7AM - 4PM  Thu: 7AM - 4PM Fri: 7AM - 4PM  Sat: 8AM - 4PM  Sun: 8AM - 4PM
data.menu: kouign amann, pain au chocolat, danish, chocolate, almond, scone, chocolate chip cookie, chausson aux pommes, cheddar scallion, cannele, gougeres
data.blurb: Talk about a local gem.  This little place recently went through an ownership change but baked goods and coffee remain to satisfy on a level that should probably be illegal. Honore, now Rosellini's is located in quaint residential neighborhood in good old Ballard that I just so happened to have been a resident of in the not so distant past. This is definitely a destination worth seeking out.
data.pastry: Best Pastry Here:  Roasted Leek and Gruyere Quiche & Kouign Amann
data.item: About The Item:  Everything.  But if you want specifics try the Roasted Leek and Gruyere quiche, a Kouign Amann and any one of their mini specialty cakes.

data.name: le reve
data.hours: Mon: 7AM - 5PM Tue: 7AM - 5PM  Wed: 7AM - 5PM  Thu: 7AM - 5PM Fri: 7AM - 5PM  Sat: 7AM - 5PM  Sun: 7AM - 5PM
data.address: 1805 Queen Anne Ave N #100, Seattle, WA 98109
data.menu: kouign amann, meringue, scones, tarte, cookie bars, tea cookies, raspberry, mogador, macaron, croissant
data.blurb: Le Reve, translates to "the dream" and appropriately so.   Quintessentially French, this little house on the hill packs in some serious goodies. A good 45 degree trek up from lower Queen Anne this place is worth the sweat and burn... or you can brave hill in your car, up to you. Like out of a story book, Le Reve will charm you with it's quaint decor, seduce you with it's butter-filled offerings and leave you longing for more.
data.pastry: Best Pastry Here:  Raspberry Crown & Kouign Amann
data.item: About the Item: The raspberry crown has a similar texture and consistency to the Kouign Amann but with gorgeous plump raspberries crowning the top giving this rich treat a nice fresh balance.
